name: Teleport 2bit
description:
Scribble Jam

Hosted by Joey Staps

BurterButterBeans Studio 2021
THEME: Scribble / Doodle
CHALLENGE: [ 2 Bit Color ] AND [ /tp ]

I present, "Teleport 2bit". This game utilizes a 4bit color palette of black, white, red and blue. Teleport through various portals spread across the maps of several minigames. Reach the goal, destroy robots with lasers, survive and escape an enemy, and collect items while sneaking around on a spacecraft.

FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT!!

AUTOSAVING ENABLED!!

UPDATES COMING SOON.

Uploaded at last! Bugs fixed
